content:
job summary

Customer service  Bookeeping  Data entry  Distribution of information

Summary of essential job functions

Open and close front desk PERIOD Greet and assist customers in person and over the phone PERIOD Enter and distribute recycling stats PERIOD Distribute daily mail PERIOD Prepare daily bank deposit PERIOD Check ads in paper against invoicing report identify and report errors PERIOD Prepare tearsheets PERIOD Monitor photo sales website PERIOD Maintain companywide email list and send out correspondence as directed PERIOD

Minimum requirements

Open to UO students eligible for federal workstudy PERIOD Able to work MonFri either 9amnoon or 13pm PERIOD

Abilities required

Friendly and professional demeanor PERIOD Computer savvy  spreadsheet skills a plus PERIOD Comfortable with basic math and able to check own work PERIOD

The Daily Emerald is the news division of Emerald Media Group University of Oregons independent student media organization PERIOD
